Dgame.Graphics.Color



struct Color;
Color defines a structure which contains 4 ubyte values, each for red, green, blue and alpha. Alpha is default 255 (1.0).

Author:
rschuett

static const Color Black;
Black Color (0, 0, 0)

static const Color White;
White Color (255, 255, 255)

static const Color Red;
Red Color (255, 0, 0)

static const Color Green;
Green Color (0, 255, 0)

static const Color Blue;
Blue Color (0, 0, 255)

static const Color Cyan;
Cyan Color (0, 255, 255)

static const Color Yellow;
Yellow Color (255, 255, 0)

static const Color Magenta;
Magenta Color (255, 0, 255)

static const Color Gray;
Gray Color (0.7, 0.7, 0.7)

ubyte red;
The color components

ubyte green;
The color components

ubyte blue;
The color components

ubyte alpha;
The color components

pure nothrow this(ubyte red, ubyte green, ubyte blue, ubyte alpha = 255);
CTor

pure nothrow this(float red, float green, float blue, float alpha = 1.00000F);
CTor Expect that every component is in range 0.0 .. 1.0

const Color withTransparency(ubyte alpha = 0);
Returns a copy of the current Color with a given transpareny.

Example:
Color(current.red, current.green, current.blue, alpha);


const pure nothrow void transferTo(SDL_Color* col);
Transfer the internal data to the SDL_Color

pure nothrow void set(ubyte red, ubyte green, ubyte blue, ubyte alpha = 255);
Set all color components to new values

pure nothrow void set(float red, float green, float blue, float alpha = 1.00000F);
Set all color components to new values Expect that every component is in range 0.0 .. 1.0

const pure nothrow bool opEquals(ref const Color col);
opEquals:
compares two Colors.

const pure nothrow float[4] asGLColor();
Returns a static float array with all color components. Every component is converted into OpenGL style. Means every component is in range 0.0 .. 1.0

const pure nothrow ubyte[4] asRGBA();
Returns the RGBA color information as static array

const pure nothrow ubyte[3] asRGB();
Returns RGB the color information as static array
